title: New Client
body:
In the new client, how do you make custom item sets? I can't find it! 

Thank you!

replies.body:
Item Sets aren't built into the Beta Client. It's being reconsidered for the new client, but it's not currently a feature. You can launch into the Legacy Client using the button at the login screen, where you'll be able to edit and create item sets for the moment.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
